remarks: The double opposite category has the same objects as the original category.  Intended for use with property lemmas such as ~ monpropd . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oppcbas.1 $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
2oppcco.2 $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
2oppcbas $p |- B = ( Base ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) $.
